Reviews.Title: Machine is great, but jury still out on Win8
Reviews.Author: Hayley Sutich
Reviews.Content: Great machine with good power and easy to set-up. Straight on the network and pretty intuitive to get sorted.I have noticed a massive spike (10gb to 30gb) in my data usage though, so need to check on what might be causing that. The other thing I need to sort through is using the Windows 8 touch menu though, it's not very friendly and I always revert back to the good'ol desktop.

Reviews.Title: Laptop YES, packaging NO
Reviews.Author: C. Meadows "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: The inner packaging, from Toshiba, was perfect, but the outer Amazon box was barely closed with tape.  The tape was applied crookedly and very short, so box was mostly open when it arrived.The laptop itself is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: A good Companion
Reviews.Author: Adesina Adio
Reviews.Content: A nice and fast machine. it's a good companion which assists greatly in my work. I'm  Glad I bought it.
